climbs.name: The Worst Punter
climbs.fa: Manny Rangel, Clay Lippincott, Laurel Arndt

content.description: This nice cruise has a large flake half way up; we tried to move it on but it won't budge. It makes for a nice hold in a wide crack. Otherwise it is straightforward wide crack stroking. Little bit of a layback at the end.
content.protection: Single .4 to .75, Double #1 to #4, slings and draws
content.location: Walk up and right to NW corner and find the long dihedral that quickly steepens. Chains on top

content.description: The beginning is the difficult crux; and it's bolted. The crack is great hands mostly with some wide and interesting moves between cracks in the first half. Straightforward fun on the latter hands portion too.
content.protection: One bolt to start, single rack of .5 camalot to #1, doubles #2-4; 10 long slings, quick draws
content.location:
In center of the Altar is a split seen from the Boulder Loop Trail. Look for a bolt at bottom right of main crack about 15' up. 

  Chain anchor

content.description: Get your soul prepared for communion with this fun slabtastic route. Start up the obvious huge flake then move to the left. The crux hits you fast at the 3rd bolt with very thin hands and delicate high steps, or try for a static left pull. Then it's into the sea of crimps. Try to stay low on the 5th bolt as you traverse right to the rap anchors.
content.location: Bolted face to the right of Spiritual Stroking

content.description: Start in a flaring finger crack that leads to a small bulge (crux). Move through the bulge and up to a nice rest before moving to the right past some face climbing. You will then move back into a flaring crack that takes you to the anchors.
content.location: This route is on the far left side of the Altar. The last route on the left.

climbs.name: The Blood of Christ
climbs.fa: Clay Lippincott, Connie Lippincott, Jeremy Runyan

content.description:
A short little crimp route that heads left in the beginning but don't go too far left. The crux has some spice in it.  

*If you decided to top rope this route without leading it. You will need to rap in from the anchors on the Worst Punter to the anchors on this route to set it up.
content.protection: You only need 4 quick draws and it has rap anchors at the top.
content.location: This route is located just to the left of the Worst Punter. You cant miss it.

content.description: North facing dome with three worthwhile routes. A short approach helps.
